LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_NotActive.label: combat chip (not active)
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_NotActive.description: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Currency.label: combat chip (currency)
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Currency.description: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Sniper.label: combat chip (sniper)
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Sniper.description: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Scouter.label: combat chip (scouter)
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Scouter.description: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Medical.label: combat chip (medical)
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Medical.description: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Charm.label: combat chip (charm)
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Charm.description: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Inspiration.label: combat chip (inspiration)
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Inspiration.descriptio: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Assassin.label: combat chip (assassin)
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Assassin.description: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.
LanguageData.Hediff_PloarisCartridge.label: cartridge
LanguageData.Hediff_PloarisCartridge.description: The cartridge can be worn by a pawn and protects the wearer from a certain death. The wearer will be resurrected immediatly upon death. Administered to a corpse, the cartridge will repair and kickstart the body back to life.\n\nSo, is life equal? Is it really good to exchange one's life for another person's life?
LanguageData.PolarisHealingPotion.label: potent healing potion
LanguageData.PolarisHealingPotion.description: A quick recovery and healing potion that automatically heals wounds. The effect of this potion are very powerful.
LanguageData.PolarisAntibiotic.label: combined antibiotic
LanguageData.PolarisAntibiotic.description: A combination of multiple antibiotics that can cure most common diseases.
LanguageData.PolarisReceptorAntagonist.label: receptor antagonist
LanguageData.PolarisReceptorAntagonist.description: The receptor antagonist is a drug that blocks drugs needs by binding to and blocking any drugs receptor rather than activating it like an agonist. So this drug will satisfy chemical needs, and ease the drug addiction at the same time.
LanguageData.PolarisVirtualNetChip.label: virtual net chip
LanguageData.PolarisVirtualNetChip.description: A chip connected to a Virtual Network that can be used for entertainment whenever needed. Moreover, it will calm down the user if they ever have a mental breakdown.
LanguageData.PolarisPsionwire.label: psionwire
LanguageData.PolarisPsionwire.description: A chip capable of stimulating psionic abilities. Using this chip can enhance biological consciousness and fire resistance.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Psycaster.label: combat chip (psycaster)
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip_Psycaster.description: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.\n\nThis one will let you out of psychic hangover.
